summary: Completed testing of Af Maay AI Language Platform. Backend APIs mostly functional (92.9% success), but critical frontend runtime errors prevent full UI testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Runtime error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
ui_bugs.selector: Select.Item components in DictionaryPage and other pages

integration_issues.issue: Cannot navigate to Dictionary, Translation, or Conversation pages due to Select component runtime errors

passed_tests: Translation API (EN â†” Maay translation working)
success_percentage: Backend: 92.9% (13/14 tests passed), Frontend: 30% (landing page works, other pages blocked by runtime errors)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Select component runtime errors preventing page navigation. All Select.Item components need non-empty value props. Also fix TTS endpoint (520 error). Frontend is currently unusable beyond landing page.
